answerText: palladium[10] Similar to the Heck Reaction, this coupling reaction is also palladium-catalyzed. In this reaction, organoboronic acid is coupled with halides.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 7 | 2 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For 10 points each, name some things somehow related to the Samuel Jackson element of the periodic table: [10] This is the unofficial Samuel Jackson element of the periodic table, since it seems to be in everything nowadays, including the reaction that won its pioneers the 2010 Nobel prize, the Heck Reaction. Sadly, its symbol isn't Sj, but Pd.
